pageProps.title: Hub - Bergerac
pageProps.description: The Bergerac Hub offers opportunities to explore what it really means to live more consciously together. The Hub is nestled near the River Dordogne and just a few minutes walk from Bergerac's beautiful town centre. A perfect location from which to enjoy both the glorious French countryside and the vibrant medieval town.

body.raw:
## Description

The Bergerac Hub offers opportunities to explore what it really means to live more consciously together. The Hub is nestled near the River Dordogne and just a few minutes walk from Bergerac's beautiful town centre. A perfect location from which to enjoy both the glorious French countryside and the vibrant medieval town.

## Key Resources

- [[../hubs/bergerac|The Hub Page]]
